configuration.name: Feature should gather a scenario with its tags and create a scenario object and add feature level tags to the scenario

RSPEC_RUN_CONFIG_SETTINGS_ID.NAME: SPEC_EXAMPLE_NAME
RSPEC_RUN_CONFIG_SETTINGS_ID.VALUE: Feature should gather a scenario with its tags and create a scenario object and add feature level tags to the scenario

item.itemvalue: RSpec.Feature should gather a scenario with its tags and create a scenario object and add feature level tags to the scenario

task.summary:
Began work on the step_definition class. Was able to identify and parse out the regex, the parameters, and all of the possible nested steps I can think of. Will need to figure out how I want to store these pseudo constants regular expressions.
Added notes section on things that will not be addressed in the current scope of this project. First note is my approach to deprecated cucumber functionality.
Updated step_definition class/spec. Added the step_definition_helper class/spec to be used in building step definition classes from files/folders.
created scenario and feature/feature helper objects to be utilized in future functionality.

Noticed a problem with the last step in a file being chopped off. Resolved that in the scenario class. Built the feature helper to generate a folder worth of content. And started work on the cuke sniffer master class. Left the cuke sniffer at the "gather all of the used steps" part, this includes nested steps obtained from the step_definition objects.
